TopicTitle: [WIP] Nova's Plernets, a Kopernicus mod dev thread- Stockalike GP2 and GP3!

Articles.Content:
> 
> Yeah, Fluf would work. Maybe just "Fluff", though.

Fluf is more kerbal than Fluff. Fluff is an English noun (feathery, lightweight, soft matter).

Other than that, interesting project! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Know what, I don't feel like contributing anymore. ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif) I'd rather do my own thing.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-22T15:34:39Z" title="06/22/2015 03:34  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 22, 2015</time> by Interplanet Janet**

> 
> Hey guys I gave planet making a try. 
> Heres What I have come up with so far: 
> 
> 
> > 
> >  
> > [http://i.imgur.com/NCnEpL0.png](http://i.imgur.com/NCnEpL0.png) [http://i.imgur.com/CuT0I6A.png](http://i.imgur.com/CuT0I6A.png) [http://i.imgur.com/h1IQsER.png](http://i.imgur.com/h1IQsER.png) [http://i.imgur.com/QfzGfNE.png](http://i.imgur.com/QfzGfNE.png) [http://i.imgur.com/RZjhdJq.png](http://i.imgur.com/RZjhdJq.png) [http://i.imgur.com/oBUv5BZ.png](http://i.imgur.com/oBUv5BZ.png)
> >  [DOWNLOAD Asclepius.zip](https://www.dropbox.com/s/1qvtuge2gs3htzu/Asclepius.zip?dl=0)
> 
> 
> I wanted to make a planet/moon with a bunch of canyons, It has a very thin oxygen atmo that only gets thick enough to run jets down in the canyons. Sort of an SSTO playground.
> 
> The only problem with it is that when you try to land your SSTO on the ground it clips through and you explode... Is there documentation somewhere where I can read about what VertexSimplexHeight, VertexSimplexNoiseColor, and what deformity does to my VertexHeightMap? Any help would be awesome! Thanks! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Ooh, I have a name for that one! How about "Slashy" because it looks like it got sliced up!

> 
> Actually, this is all based off Nova's planet concepts. They are good ideas, but they don't fit in with this mod.
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> ..but the oxygen idea seems reasonable. However, I think it should be on Egar (GP3) instead, since it will be waaaay too hard to land on.
> 
> - - - Updated - - -

My apologies, I really meant to post this on the Kopernicus Dev thread. 

If it gives you any ideas feel free to run with them ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

That planet's huge! o.O

Amazing job!
Okay wait... whose planet are we talking about? I'd like this thread to stay on topic, please. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> My apologies, I really meant to post this on the Kopernicus Dev thread. 
> If it gives you any ideas feel free to run with them ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Wait. What do you mean, those were my ideas.
A promising mod, keep going ! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> A promising mod, keep going ! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Don't worry, although development was kinda stalled there, we're back on track now, but Fluff still looks bumpy. I can't figure out how to fix it. My solution is to take a break and work on visual mod compatibility stuff. You know, DOE and planet shine configs.
I understand, a mod like this is a big deal. You have all my cheers ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
In other news, Kopernicus just went beta. Yay!

Gah, development is going slow, but for... good reasons.

This isn't the only KSP mod I'm working on anymore ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

The other one is partly visuals, and partly utility, and I'm not saying what it is yet, since its still in its early stages.

DON'T WORRY! I'm still working on this one too! But the other has to be done as well.

EDIT: Yay, two bars of rep!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-30T12:27:09Z" title="06/30/2015 12:27  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 30, 2015</time> by ThatGuyWithALongUsername**

Well, that "other mod" is on hiatus for now. It was causing difficulties. Meaning that I'm working on this again!

First what I have to do is fix up fluff...
Er... you know there's a Gas Planet Two + all Nova's Ideas mod out there? It is called Kerbol Plus and I'm the lead developer. Would you like to collaborate?

> 
> Er... you know that people can develop their own ideas, independent from already existing content? There's no need for one single GP2 Mod, if someone else want's to do his own GP2, let him do. It's not a contest.

Not a contest but people may get confused... I shall add a link to this mod in my thread.

In searching for something else I found this thread about Nova's concepts, [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/1849](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/1849) If you haven't seen it already it could be useful. In particular it's got technical details like orbital radii and atmospheric pressures.
Where is the download.

> 
> Where is the download.

This is in Add-on development, there's usually not a download yet because the addon is in development. And addon makers usually don't like when people ask for a download.
ok ok ok

How is this planet pack going? Any progress on new planets?

FYI: I'm not trying to push you

Well, I'm back on the forums, but I'm afraid this mod is... uh... "postponed indefinitely". Sorry. PM me if you want to take over development, and I will give you a dev copy (Fluff still won't work, though). Remember, this is a stockalike mod, make sure to keep it that way, because that's what keeps it separate from all the other nova planet mods.

This looks incredible... too bad it was stopped.

I would've asked like Uranus, to have it's rings from pole to pole instead. 

Good luck to whomever picks up !

> 
> This looks incredible... too bad it was stopped.
> I would've asked like Uranus, to have it's rings from pole to pole instead. 
> 
> Good luck to whomever picks up !

You know what...

I might start working on this again... ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

It is officially back. Also, 100th post!

I have decided to do a "texture contest" for each planet and moon, starting with Fluff. I have updated the OP so you can find the details there. It's hard to miss the giant red text.

The configs don't need any tweaking for Kopernicus 0.4, Meander and Eeloo work fine.

And amarius1, I will not collaborate because this mod is in a stockalike style, making this a different mod. Feel free to contribute, though. Either in textures or in OH MY GOSH HOW DID YOU MAKE WORKING GEYSERS PLZ TELL ME.

This may prove to be a huge headache when I end up having to license this...

BUMP!

Nobody is making any textures for this mod yet, so I may have to stop the "open-source community textures" thing. So now I need a texturer. Is anyone looking to texture some stockalike planets? If not, this mod will have to be abandoned again. ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

I need to get textures somehow...
